practice_phrases.target: I am going to go soon
are you going to go today?
I do not want to go before evening
she has to go, but I want to help her

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我会在六点之前走
practice_phrases.target: I guess I am going to go before six o'clock

practice_phrases.known: 我不喜欢走，因为我喜欢和你说英语
practice_phrases.target: I do not like to go, because I like to speak English with you
